text: Connor Ryan Swindells (born 19 September 1996) is a British actor and model. He is best known for his role as Adam Groff in the Netflix original comedy- drama series Sex Education (2019â€“present). In 2018, he appeared alongside Gerard Butler and Peter Mullan in the psychological thriller movie The Vanishing. Swindells was born in Lewes, East Sussex. He is dating Sex Education co-star Aimee Lou Wood. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Sussex Category:English models Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors
